attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our class president😍 and it asked me to turn on notifications. I was like sure Donny💦 is my main man he won’t spam me right? WRONG! I kept getting spammed and to top it all off he asked for my PHONE NUMBER! I gave it to him of course because I thought DonBon🎂 would personally sext me. (yeah i mean sext) and all i did was get calls all day. All of a sudden the spam stopped then the strangest thing happened, I kept getting calls in Russian and my spam from Mr.Duck🥴 stopped. The next thing I know someone came to my front door, i looked out the peep hole and it was Trumpie😫 himself! He had a big bag with him tho?? I let him in of course and HE LOOTED MY HOUSE!! AND THE POLICE DID NOTHING! It’s a good thing my daughter wasn’t home because Lord knows he likes little children.

attributes.title: I didn’t get what I wanted
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I expect daddy trump to get mailed to me! I Have been waiting for 17391737288162727;8826382726382963728367382273729363722836738272628282663827263828262 days and I just am so lonely without daddy trump next to me. 💦💦💦 1 star. Ugh

attributes.title: i don’t want to mr.presidents pp
attributes.review: this app is asking weird and personal questions that i’m uncomfortable sharing with people. i would not recommend this app to ANYONE!!! i wish i could rate this app 0 stars but sadly i cant do that. i hope this app gets deleted off the app store soon because nobody should be able to see those nasty images of our president. this app can burn in he🏒🏒!!!

attributes.title: If you could somehow turn a flaming poo into code for an app...
attributes.review:
I don’t know who created this monstrosity, but it seems to be promoting pedophilia, false statistics, and general ignorance? Which is weird because it says “keep America great” when you open the app, and this is what it offers me? I’d deem this a false advertisement without a doubt. 

I’d give it less than one star if I could. 
Only then would it have less stars than Trump has impeachments!

attributes.title: Not a good place to look for spray tan tips
attributes.review: I wanted to know how to get a better spray tan so i thought no better place or person to learn from than america’s “leader” Mr.SunnyD himself. Once I downloaded this app i soon realized how botched his under eye circles were and immediately deleted.🍊🍊🏀☢️🟠 I also realized the ignorance, homophobia, and racism that was included in this app wasn’t a good look either. I would give it 0 stars if i could.

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: I downloaded because I love racist dictators but they kept telling me to rape children and I’m not about that life.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: If you want to support someone who has been into human trafficking, raping children, paying those children’s families for their silence on said rape, made it their life’s goal to turn America into a fascist state, been suuuuuper public about their racism, and overall been an embarrassment to humanity, go ahead and download this app. Otherwise, keep on truckin’.
